website_summaries.verdict: This mammoth cookie cutter set comes complete with just about every shape, number, and letter a baker could possibly want. Excellent quality and variety for the price.
pros: With a whopping 101 pieces, this is hands-down one of the most complete and versatile cookie cutter sets out there
Comes with a variety of festive shapes to cover every major holiday
Safe and easy enough for little helpers to handle with confidence
Color coded themes for fuss-free sorting
cons: Plastic construction probably won't last forever
Getting the pieces back into the storage bag can be a challenge

website_summaries.verdict: Safe edges and fun colors make these cookie cutters ideal for baking with children.
pros: Large set comes with 101 colorful cookie cutters
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
Includes holiday shapes, animal shapes, numbers, letters, and more
Sits at a low price point
cons: Large set does not include any Thanksgiving shaped cookie cutters

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I went for this set instead of spending tons of money on steel cutters. I made Halloween cookies with my 7-year-old nephew using the halloween ones, and we both had lots of fun! Cuts nicely and cleanly, dough does not stick to the plastic, and I hand-washed them and let them dry on the rack just like any other utensil/dish, and they were fine. No complaints here. Can’t wait to try the Christmas ones next month!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price but you also get what you pay for. Cons: The major problem I have with this set is the size variance. Numbers and letters are super small and some of the other cutters are freaking massive! They give you a question mark but no zero....so bizarre. Some of the cutters came warped a bit, so the plastic is not that ridged to stay flat. Pros: Good variety. Cutter color is organized by holiday/category so it's easy to know which ones go together.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive these Cookie Cutters. I bought them to add a little excitement to teaching my 2 year old her shapes and letters by using them to bake cookies. Initially, I was really happy because the bag was filled with different shapes, sizes and coolers. But, when I opened the bag and started to look through them all, I noticed broken/cracked cookie cutters. To make it worse, 2 of the letters in her name were broken. Based on other reviews, it seems as though I could've just gotten a bad batch, but this is my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Corn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and easy clean-up
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Literally if you use even just 10 of them, it's worth it. Shapes for every season, holiday, etc. They're not the fanciest or most well made but how can you pass up this deal? Also the letters are a little Comic Sans-y, but fun for getting started with cutout cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to use with her play doh. She loves to use my kitchen utensils and cookie cutters so thought these would be great for her to use. They are sturdy plastic and she loves all the letters and other shapes included. I’m sure they would be great as actual cookie cutters too but for now we are using them to play with play doh.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Green

customer_reviews.title: It's like buying a soft drink at the 7-11 that's the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these yet and I'm probably just a big idiot for buying them. But for gosh sakes! There are 101 of them! It's like buying a soft drink at the 7-11 that's the size of your head, but you have to have it because it's only $.79. They seem nice and sturdy, somewhere in between the cheap flimsy walmart cookie cutters and a nice metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Beth from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Good set, for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. The only issue was, that one cookie cutter at something black all over it. It would come off on your hands, but wouldn’t wash off in the sink. We ended up throwing that one away. All the others seemed fine. We washed them before use, and they worked perfectly for what I wanted them for!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for every Mimi! I purchased this set last year for baking with my granddaughter and we have gotten hours of fun out of them! She also uses them to stencil in her coloring projects, and in her play-dough toys! I use them to "cut" a heart or bear into her sandwiches and she's tickled pink that Mimi made her a "heart sandwich". We have washed them in the dishwasher with the heat dry turned off and they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Liaglynn

customer_reviews.title: Really large size, but some small too
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for cookie cutters for a long time but I wanted the small ones. Well, this kit comes with small, medium and big ones.. so I am glad that I purchased it. Most of them are in a large size (I don’t even know if I am going to use it), but better than paying $10-15 in small ones (pack of 4-6). I have used them to cut pancakes and dough (pie) for decoration, and it works great. I heard some people counted and some were missing, mine was all in there. The box was broken on the bottom though, but I wasn’t going to keep in it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: So many cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Full Disclosure - I ended up returning these before I used them because I tough-talked myself and realized I did not need over 100 cookies cutters in my 900sq ft apartment with a kitchen that could sit inside a labrador’s footprint. But I was impressed, initially, by the sheer quantity you get for the price and by the quality when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Great set: covers the bases
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great set of cookie cutters to have! It covers all the basic American things (holidays, seasons, football, etc). The numbers and letters are pretty small, but there are a wide variety of sizes. It comes in a nice, big tub with a handle. You just can’t beat it! Update: I knocked a star off because, while they had Easter cutters, they did not have St. Patrick’s day cutters. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Shye Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Cookies for Every Season!
customer_reviews.text: I used to only make cut out cookies for Christmas but since buying this I think I have found the excuse for making them for just about every other holiday and season! There are so many different cutters! The container they come in is definitely too flimsy to store them in for long in my opinion. Mine are still stored in it after 6 months but I have to scotch tape the lid on. As soon as I figure out what else to put them in then the bucket will be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: Lots and lots of cute (but shallow) cookie cutters!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cutters for a great price. A few of the larger cutters are very bendable and not as rigid as I'd hoped they'd be..I'd worry about consistancy in the shapes of the resulting cookies. My biggest problem is that the cutters are not very deep, and I like to roll my sugar cookie dough very thick. But, they're cute and you get a ton of them, just don't think I'll be using them as often as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Momto2boys

customer_reviews.title: Beyond pleased. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Thankful for ALL 101 of these cookie cutters! Thank youuu!!! I don’t know what’s up with the other reviews - but I’m saying right now that these are the cutest and will be used for years to come. A big selection to choose from for only $8?? What a bargain! My family and I say BUY IT. BUY IT AND MAKE THE MEMORIES!! 100% worth it. By the way this brand is Wilton. Big baking product company. YAY!!! Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Renea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Still using these ten years later..
customer_reviews.text: Great set. There is a shape for any holiday or occasion you can think of. They are easy to use and clean. We have even used them as stencils for various art projects with my toddler or even just as some colorful “toys” to keep her busy while I messed around in the kitchen. After looking at the purchase date, I realized I have had these for over ten years and they are still in great shape! My only complaint would be that the outer container is a little flimsy, and it can be hard to get the lid to stay on sometimes, but that’s why tape was invented.
customer_reviews.author: nicole0701

customer_reviews.title: Lions, tigers & bears, oh my!!
customer_reviews.text: This has every shape you could imagine, its super cheap and amazing quality. They come in multiple shapes, sizes and designs. We use them for cookies and playdough or slime. Money well spent and these will last a lifetime! These would make a great gift for a fun parent or grandparent. A great way to consume time and to teach family cookie recipes to the kids😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Mackynzie

customer_reviews.title: Best cookie cutter purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cookie cutters for a Halloween cookie decorating contest I signed up for. I came across this set with a variety and because they were priced just right, I bought them. These have been amazing so far! We used them for our Halloween cookie contest (and won 1st place). Now I have been using them all December long for holiday baking! I anticipate using them throughout the year for various holidays!
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest way to get cookie cutters for every occasion. They work fine which is great considering the price. I'm an experienced baker, but cut out cookies are not something I do often. I can imagine anyone doing a lot of cut out cookie baking would want something a bit more sturdy, but these work great for the average user.
customer_reviews.author: KFraed

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete set??
customer_reviews.text: I got every single cutter just as advertised, except for numbers. I got 2x #3 and I got no #5 or #6. Someone must've been sleeping on the job in the numbers line that day. Somewhat disappointed in what I would otherwise consider a very good starting cutter kit from a usually reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: V91-Bleach

customer_reviews.title: Cookies cutters cut cookies
customer_reviews.text: Needed some cookies cutters for a variety of reasons. I wish I had gotten a mini pack instead, these things are huge. Mildly sturdy. It gets the job done. Maybe it’s because I’m not that experienced with cookie cutters, but there was definitely a learning curve when it came to using these. The colors make it slightly easier to find what you’re looking for. I expect that it will take me a while to find uses for all of them, but that’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Mendez

customer_reviews.title: No shamrock
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set thinking it would be everything that I need for holidays and birthdays. The tub is bigger than I expected (but not surprising for 101 pieces) but I figured it was worth the space as long as I never have to buy anymore cookie cutters. Lo and behold the first time I go to use it and there's nothing for St. Patrick's day! I should have looked over the image of all the shapes more carefully. These are going back because they're not a great replacement for the cookie cutters I already have (they're a bit thin and don't look too durable).
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are too big
customer_reviews.text: I was excited with the number, 101 wow! But the sizes are not good, at least for me. I wanted to do cookies as Christmas gift. The gingerbread family is too big. There are some others also too big. It was a complete set, though. I choose the ones with better sizes and avoid the big ones. A pair of them have stains that can’t remove even after washing, so I am just trashing them. See photos for size idea.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously a ton of cookie cutters. While there are a decent amount of shapes that I'm never going to use, (who wants to eat a foot-shaped cookie?), this set covers all the important shapes, (xmas tree, snowman, candy cane, hearts, stars, gingerbread couple, etc.). Very good price for a "lifetime set" of cutters, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Lots lf cookies in our future.
customer_reviews.text: Over ask these cookie cutters are just as described. Im happy with them and the little ones are too. They are plastic so some may feel a tad bit flimsy but none have broken for us. I have some rough little bakers with me as well. I love having more than a couple cutters for each U.S. holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: The cutters are a nice size. I was concerned the letters and numbers were to small but once baked it was a perfect size. It was difficult to used and clean the A because of the same circle in the center. The cuts were clean but make sure you roll dough not to be too thick. Overall I was satisfied with the cookies cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such choices!
customer_reviews.text: For my purposes, this rating could have been a 5-star; however, I should point out, the cookie cutters ARE plastic, not stainless steel. I purchased them to make Valentine cookies with my grandson. There were many shapes and sizes of hearts, so we made many cookies--even cut little hearts in the center of the big hearts, so the strawberry jam could peek through. I would definitely recommend this for the casual cookie baker. I don't expect them to last forever, but with such a variety and 101 of them, they will last until my grandchildren are too sophisticated to make cookies with grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Smug1

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: As some other users mentioned, my cutters were smeared with something weird, but I was going to wash them anyway and it came right off. The letters are kind of small and once baked my cookies spread which they normally don't do. I also had to go down in size and couldn't make my cookies as thick as I like because these cutters aren't as tall as the one's I typically work with. But you get sooooo many!!!! I love the variety and I recommend for a beginning cookier like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible I just finally got around to use this
customer_reviews.text: Horrible I just finally got around to use this! Don’t rely on them to cut your dough or pancake or anything! This is more like a toy for toddlers! Wished I could return it but it’s too late ...def should have used it as soon as I got it it wasn’t my fault I didn’t test them right away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for all holidays
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use all but this month (October) I’ve been having more fun than ever making cookies. The reason for getting them was to bake cookies for my sons Halloween party and I can’t wait they are going to be so cute. Also he loves dinosaurs so if that caught my eye as well
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I needed to add the odds and ends to my collection. Has a little of everything! Perfect size. I am so thrilled of the size. I had it in my head they were smaller when I ordered them but they are actually a really great size! They are super sturdy, make the perfect cut for any cookie, and super easy to clean! Great for the avid cookie/biscuit baker or just for the kids to have some fun! Great value for the price! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shaelee Booth

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to COUNT your pieces on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I love these cutters! A lot of them are nice and big which are more fun for my son. After counting them all out when we got them however there were only 100 pieces—the large gingerbread woman was missing. The difference between the man and woman is really negligible I think so I’m not bothered but the packaging holding the pieces is very flimsy so I can easily see it sneaking out the top.
customer_reviews.author: AAM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my gift to my friend. She absolutely loves it. It is ideally suited for those people who love to bake cookies and it allows you to be very creative with the many letters and numbers. I can't believe how estactic she was upon receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: sammyjo

customer_reviews.title: Not Upto Mark
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and flimsy. I did not have very high hopes to start with but these disappointed me. The size is pretty big, but these don't seem like something that you would keep with you for the long run. They might be good enough for first 10 or 15 times if you are careful; but I wouldn't be counting on them to last longer. I noticed the weight and hoped that they would be strong enough, they were bigger than I expected but not as strong as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Devi Lakshmi

customer_reviews.title: Great Value; Dishwasher Safe
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the value. Dishwasher safe is a rare bonus! Great variety. Bought as a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Expected less and received more
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these cookie cutters I wasn’t expecting amazing quality since I read through some reviews. I received all 101 today and I’m amazed at the sturdiness of them. Every cutter was fine except for the Halloween house which came slickly bent but it’s still useable. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for cheap and sturdy cutters for beginner bakers. I paid $8.49 for all 101 and they are better quality compared to my $12.99 for 5 cutters from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Desarae Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great set! All you need!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome deal and variety. Most of our other Christmas cookie cutters are metal which bend and get tricky to store. These are made of plastic, so sturdier for use and storage. Has an awesome variety for all holidays plus numbers and letters!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Boyed

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a let down. These may be good for something else, but not great for baking/cookie cutters. They are cheap, not sharp enough for a clean line cookie and the letters are small/have weird cut outs/do not form well once baked
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: These are made of really cheap, flimsy plastic. Not really ideal for a sturdier dough, such as sugar cookie dough. I don't think it would do too well with a sandwich either. Works on eggs. Will probably use as play clay accessories instead of for baked goods or food.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Missing ghost
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these just for Halloween and of course it’s missing the ghost. If it was possible I would return them and get a new set but it’s to late for that. But other than it missing parts they work great
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Value!
customer_reviews.text: Decided I needed to learn to decorate cookies and needed more than Christmas cookie cutters. A very reasonable price and a great variety. Some basic shapes, more complicated ones, different sizes. Cut cleanly, wash up great.
customer_reviews.author: G. Witham

customer_reviews.title: Studiness
customer_reviews.text: Size is too huge for the cookies and I know it is plastic but too light for the material not sharp for cut.Do not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda w

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun to Use
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these! There are many different shapes for a variety of special events and holidays. They are very easy to clean, and the dough didn't stick to it. They leave clean cuts in the dough with smooth edges. Very easy to use and fun. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Hala

customer_reviews.title: Missing #2 and alphabet "I"
customer_reviews.text: Missing #2 and alphabet "I".... My son is "2" years old... and I do need "I" for my project, too. I would't care if anything else were missing out of 101 pieces, but those are pretty important pieces. Do I need to return everything and order another to "try" to see if I get those for the next order?? Or anyway I can get those two pieces shipped from ... someone?
customer_reviews.author: The Reed

customer_reviews.title: 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you would need. Or at least for me anyways. We use these for cookies, play dough, ornament making, etc! Best bang for your buck in my opinion. Haven’t had any break and they’ve washed well in the dishwasher on lowest heat.
customer_reviews.author: Saprina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for kid use. They’re bigger than I imagined but they’re really great. Sturdier than I expected for the price, and we love the variety of shapes. Used them to make Xmas cookies and salt dough ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Open Container - Items do not fit into it.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the picture, it did not come in the container as advertised. It was put in a bag since they knew the cutters would fly around during shipping. There were 101 items, but they would not fit into the container, I will need to get a new one to hold them all. The cutters seem to be in tact, but we haven't used them yet. Some are very large - too big for cookies but will do for playdoh fun. Given the price, I'll probably keep them but may end up ordering metal ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I made cookies the day they came in!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like about it was the container, but that doesn't effect the product one bit. I can always make something to put them in and recycle the container. It all works out! (These pictures are from last Christmas, my mother had the same exact ones and I loved them so much I needed my own!)
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: Good selection
customer_reviews.text: For the price, we get a lot of shapes but the plastic material is thin and not sturdy. The shape selection is suitable for various purposes and it is fun to cut bread/tortilla etc., in fun shapes for my daughter’s meal and also to make cookies/brownies.
customer_reviews.author: sareen

customer_reviews.title: So many!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my autistic niece. She has been asking for specific shapes and letters. Well, now she has 101! She put them to use right away and was so happy. They even thought to add little handle guides to better hold the shapes. Awesome. I'm happy she's happy. It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio B.

customer_reviews.title: Letters only 2.5" - not 3.5"
customer_reviews.text: The package says an average of 3.5" for cutters. There are some larger shapes for sure, but all of the letters are only 2.5". Seems misleading, being that the first thing listed in the description is the alphabet. It would be nice to see more information on this available in the description, so it is easier to tell if this product meets your needs or not before purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy C.

customer_reviews.title: That’s a lot of cutters!
customer_reviews.text: Having a hard time getting them all back in the container without some major wiggling, but that’s because there are so many! Fun shapes. Our intended use is for clay crafting, not cooking and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Got these to make sugar cookies with my 3 yr. old niece. They work really well and didn’t scratch the table since they are plastic so that was definitely a plus for me. I love all the different shapes and letters.
customer_reviews.author: Corissa kemp

customer_reviews.title: Very sloppy packaging
customer_reviews.text: This package came completely destroyed as if someone had purchased it before and returned it and they just threw everything in the box and taped it up. In very disappointed in the appearance of the product.
customer_reviews.author: KAY

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set!!
customer_reviews.text: The 9 doubles as both the 6 & 9. Also you use the O from the alphabet for your number ZERO. These are awesome cutters!! Wonderful value for the $. Mine came with the ampersand.
customer_reviews.author: tcstenor

customer_reviews.title: One of the best buy's I've made in a while!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy! So much for your money's worth! There is literally just about anything you could need in here. Used several of them already and they worked great. I would say that my only downside would be that where they are plastic, I could see how they could get broken or snap easier then their metal counterparts, but so long as they're taken care of properly it shouldn't be an issue. I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a large variety of pattens for a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with my granddaughter..and of course she looked on the bottom to pick out which ones she wanted to make..she picked out quite a few including the butterfly..after much digging, and then dumping them in my sink,there was no butterfly! After she went home, I sat down to see if any others were missing..turns out, we received two bunnies,instead of one and a butterfly..so all in all a very good deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: This has all the basics, and a bunch of them come in different sizes. I am a little sad that the letters and numbers are pretty small. They're small enough that I have to be careful not to break the middle part of "B".
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Givens

customer_reviews.title: A lot of cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons, 3 and 5, like to bake along with their parents. Got this to add more fun. The enjoy picking out the letters of their names and different other shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for cookies, biscuits, and even pancakes (wrapped in tin foil). I LOVE them. Whatever ones I know I’ll never use we’re added to my daughters playdough tools!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Lots of variety and does what they are supposed to do but they are a light plastic and can break easily ..... However they came in a plastic carrier great for storage and we used them with no problem ..... good value
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Large variety but not very thick or sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and large variety. However not very thick or sturdy at all. Would be fine for thinner cookies. But that is about it. Does not work well to cut sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these cookie cutters. Other reviews are right when they say that sizes are way off. Letters are tiny and some other shakes (like pumpkin, gingerbread man) are huge! But for the price, these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Variety
customer_reviews.text: The amount you get for the price is worth it. They are good but not Baker quality like the metal cutters. Still is worth it if you bake a lot of cookies for various holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rees

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! You can’t beat the value. There are cookie cutters in here for every holiday or season throughout the year. I make lots of cookies for friends and family and this was a great addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute buy!
customer_reviews.text: There is very large variety in here. My 2 year old loved all the shapes. It was a good buy. My complaint is that I wish the container it came I was bigger. I can’t get them all back in the container. I have to get a container to store all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Shajj

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety, Durable, Fun with Play Dough, Work with Bread Too
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of cutters. We bought them for use with play dough, which is working out well. Rating them 4 stars vs. 5 because the cutters could be deeper and of a thicker plastic. We have a few cutters of another brand that are deeper, of a thicker plastic and have a slightly sharper edge. They cut a little easier due to all three factors. However, the Wilton cutters are proving to be fine overall for play dough. They also work to cut sandwiches (that aren't too thick) into fun shapes. Haven't yet tried them for cookie dough, but guessing that they'll fine, given how they work with play dough.
customer_reviews.author: Overmann

customer_reviews.title: I've made a mistake.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about 101 cookie cutters? My kid is driving me insane now, wanting to make 101 different shapes of cookies... I think I've made a mistake getting them...
customer_reviews.author: Leeane D.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of nice, basic cutters.  Not so great packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer plastic over metal cookie cutters as metal bends easier and rusts. I love the huge selection and fantastic price of these. I also love the fact that the groups of items are color-coded. For example, all Christmas cutters are in green. Some groups have two different sub-groups within. I think vehicles shares a color with some random items like hands and feet or serrated circles. But it's still pretty easy to find what you need. My only complaint is that the tub they package them in is very thin plastic and flimsy. I would have paid more for a nicer-looking tub to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: It will work for now
customer_reviews.text: This had everything I was looking for except for No St. Patrick's cut outs, that I was disappointed about, I think the supplier should make it right to me so I don't have to buy them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Too many large cutters, a lot of vague shapes that didn't really look like anything. Some are rather thin plastic. Container for storage they came in was split and useless but too much trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: milokoba

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo fun!! 101 shapes to choose from!! I use them when I make cookies, I use them to cut my kids sandwiches for Bento lunches!! Lots of shapes, letters, numbers to choose from. Even holiday cutters!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce K.

customer_reviews.title: Small number/letters: Shapes were fine
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 4 stars because all the shapes, numbers, letters are all different sizes. Granted I bought this set for the numbers and letters and they were VERY small, too small for a sugar cookie IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic to use these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to use these! Every single cutter was intact, no cracks or stains. I don't understand why everyone is getting mad for the couple of huge cutters its only like 7 of them and all of those seven have a exact one in a smalled size. I think the bigger ones would be great to use to make bigger cookies to gift so thats awesome 😭 I would give 10 stars if possible!
customer_reviews.author: hi

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie cutter set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just beginning my cookie cutter collection, and this is the most comprehensive cookie set I could find. Love that it covers most of the major holidays and has cutters in a variety of sizes for each holiday.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The container they came in was cracked in 4 places and ill have to get something else to store them in. But the cutters them selves are great.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Great price but not fully satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the amount of cookie cutters. I ordered this for my kindergarten class to use with play dough. I’m very disappointed that there isn’t a zero included in the numbers. I wanted to allow my kinders to cut out all of their letters and numbers in centers. The other cutters are great for seasons and holidays, and they will enjoy those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cookie cutters. So many to choose from. I actually bought these for the kids to use with their play-doh. They are safe and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R. Gillen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. Big Pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 2yr old daughter. I have 5 stars because the variation and quality seem pretty good. Just be aware, these cutters are big! Some are about the same size as an adult hand or slightly larger. I usually like to give my daughter the small sized containers of play doh but these are so big that I need a full size jar so she can actually use the cutters. This might be a bit much for a small only child, but if you don't mind the big pieces or have more than one child, this would be a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set but size issues
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving the quantity of the whole set and the diverse cutters that are included. I wish the alphabet and numbers were bigger though. They were smaller than the rest of the set and it was disappointing since I primarily bought the set for those cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking with your kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Wilton continues to hold true to its name. There are cookie cutters for every occasion. They are sharp enough to cut dough easily but still safe for kids to use. My toddler loves them as well since there are so many bright colors and shapes. The shapes are somewhat color coded by category. For example, all the Valentines shapes are pink.
customer_reviews.author: E.H.

customer_reviews.title: versatile and great variety
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as cookie cutters. My 3 year old loves playing with them. They are perfect for real cookies, play dough or drawing. good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna S.

customer_reviews.title: good for 1/4" rolled dough
customer_reviews.text: pros: lots of shapes, easy to use cons: letters and numbers are too thin to use for traditional 3/8" dough. I had to use 1/4" instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ouzter

customer_reviews.title: Lots of shapes
customer_reviews.text: Lots of variety— maybe too much. It would have been nice to have upper and lowercase letters instead of so many other things.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Way more than I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! This set includes way more cookie cutters than I will ever be able to use, but this was a much better deal than any other set I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: kapplejack

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! I am happy they are larger than I thought but omg
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: The only cookie cutters you'll need
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I bought them on a whim when they were on sale. I love making cookies - and these give me tons of reasons to make them. Most holidays are included as well as fun shapes like dinosaurs, flowers and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for DIY cook.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Mother's Day gift for my sister. She likes every single feature about them. The cookies and brownies come out wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Faulisi

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful assortment of cutters. My grandson loves to use them with play dough, and they work very well with cookie dough as well. Washed them by hand, not in the dishwasher. I agree with others--it's difficult to put them back into the tub so they all fit, and the tub lid is flimsy. We just used another container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge! But functional
customer_reviews.text: Not the average cookie cutter size. These things are huge!!! Mine came open scattered around in a box. Other than the huge size, they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay/good. There’s some I like and a lot I dont like. They are easy to use and clean. I’ve only hand washed them, so idk about dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Lexie Arrants

customer_reviews.title: Roll the dice, you might get all the advertised shapes!
customer_reviews.text: Good selection but buyer beware- seems like everyone is missing at least one! I got two letter Vs and no S. Stinks because I can't spell my name now. I guess it's just a gamble you take when buying cookie cutters this way. The selection here includes shapes you never knew you needed, and a few you might actually need! Taught a 4 year old boy and a 31 year old man how to make Christmas cookies and these cutters worked well for both age groups.
customer_reviews.author: CSmith

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great cookie cutters, using for play dough with preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Great value, you get so many in the bucket. I wish the bucket were sturdier, it’s very flimsy plastic and some of the lid had popped off during shipping so some of the cutters were outside of it but nothing was damaged or broken.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Satko

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Literally all the possible shapes you could need or want for any holiday or celebration! Super easy to use, perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah D

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Decent set for kids. They are very thin and flimsy. Lots of repeat shapes in many sizes. I prefer metal cutters but these were a awesome deal for the kids to play with.
customer_reviews.author: PMommy3

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I use them for everything from making sandwiches fun shapes to ornaments. I didn't want my 1 year old pulling on christmas ornaments last year so this was a great option! She pulled them off but I wasn't worried about anything breaking then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute designs
customer_reviews.text: Even though they are plastic, they're actually pretty easy and sturdy to use. Great price for all that's included versus buying each holiday the individually. Bin was not sealed completely when arrived and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Truthbetold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I expected and perfect for little hands. Going from playdough to cookie dough with easy clean-up.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this huge selection, many different shapes and sizes. It comes in nice books as shown in the picture. Shipped so fast. My kids loved the shapes
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for this product is mediocre. It's a thin flimsy plastic bucket and is not sufficient enough to store these. I had to get a different storage container. The cutters are sufficient, nothing fancy, not too sturdy but they work.
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot bigger than I expected. I wanted to use these for the kids to play with play dough but they are too big. I don’t know that I would even want to use them for cookies unless you want Monster cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Johnson

product_meta.title: Wilton Cookie Cutters Set, 101-Piece — Alphabet, Numbers and Holiday Cookie Cutters
product_meta.description: 101 Cookie Cutters. With this set, you're covered. Make cookies featuring popular holiday and theme shapes like sports, flowers, animals and more. Before first and after each use, wash in warm, soapy water; rinse and dry thoroughly
feature_bullets: 101 colorful plastic cookie cutters; average size measures 3 1/2 by 3 1/2 inches
1/3 inch comfort edge and deep blade for ease of use
Shapes for Valentine's Day, Easter, Fourth of July, Halloween, Christmas, even Super Bowl Sunday; complete alphabet for fun cookie messages
Great for cutting out cookies, sandwiches, all kinds of foods, into different shapes; fun for crafting too
Easy to clean and dishwasher safe

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,160 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
